snippet: The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission may not have adequate controls to protect information that could be used to sabotage the power grid, the Energy Department’s inspector general said.
abstract: Energy Department's inspector general reports that the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission may not have adequate controls to protect information that could be used to sabotage the national power grid.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission may not have adequate controls to protect information that could be used to sabotage the power grid, the Energy Department’s inspector general said.

headline.main: Energy Panel Faulted on Information Safeguards
headline.print_headline: Energy Panel Faulted on Information Safeguards

keywords.value: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
keywords.name: organizations
